Uses of Class
org.xlattice.util.cmdline.CmdLineOpt

  • Packages that use CmdLineOpt 
    Package Description
    org.xlattice.util.cmdline
    This is a facility for rapidly setting up software to pick values off of command lines.

    • Uses of CmdLineOpt in org.xlattice.util.cmdline

      Subclasses of CmdLineOpt in org.xlattice.util.cmdline 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BooleanOpt
      Binds a boolean field in an object to a command line argument.
      class  DoubleOpt
      Binds a command line argument to a double field in an object.
      class  IntOpt
      Bind a command line argument to an int field in an object, optionally specifiying minimum and maximum value.
      class  LongOpt
      Binding between a command line option and a long field in an object, with optional minimum and maximum values.
      class  StringOpt
      Bind a command line option value to a String field.
      Methods in org.xlattice.util.cmdline that return CmdLineOpt 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CmdLineOpt CmdLineSpec.findOption(java.lang.String oName) 
      CmdLineOpt[] CmdLineSpec.getOptionDescriptors() 
      Methods in org.xlattice.util.cmdline with parameters of type CmdLineOpt 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int Bindery.bind(java.lang.String[] args, CmdLineOpt[] options, java.lang.Object target)
      Bind the command line arguments, given a set of option descriptors.
      Constructors in org.xlattice.util.cmdline with parameters of type CmdLineOpt 
      Constructor and Description
      Bindery(CmdLineOpt[] opts)
      Create a bindery from a set of command line options.
      CmdLineSpec(CmdLineOpt[] opts)
      Default constructor.
      CmdLineSpec(java.lang.String javaOpt, CmdLineOpt[] opts, java.lang.String others)
      Create a command line specification.
